#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Statistic.

= Description =

The statistic element keep track of an individual statistic.

= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

 # id - Unique identifer.
 # date-computed
 # name - Name of statistic. The name of the statistic used sets the meaning and units used for the value.

The Statistic's name is limited to a list of valid values (See [[StatisiticNameGolf Markup Language Reference: Statistics.]]).

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

None.

== Structural Elements ==

None.

= Notes =
